submapp.map2d.Map2d¶

class submapp.map2d.Map2d(som, name: str = 'MyMap')¶

A map associated to a Som object representing a time series

A Map2d object is a convenient way of manipulating SOM and HMM outputs as it stores in the same object:

  • true_values, np.array[float], shape=( nb_inputs_mapped, p)

    • The real values with which the Map2d was constructed if the method map_from_data was used.

    • The real values the Map2d tries to reconstruct if the method map_from_classes was used. In this case classes are propably the output of the viterbi method and the true values - if available - have to be specified by the user either when calling the method map_from_classes or with the method add_true_values

  • classes, np.array[int], shape=( nb_inputs_mapped) classes of the SOM representing true_values

  • values, np.array[float], shape=( nb_inputs_mapped, p) Referent vectors associated to classes

  • rmse_with_respect_to_depth, pandas.DataFrame that contains RMSE for each variables for each depth level.

In addition, it stores its associated Som object so that essential properties are easy to access such as:

  • distance_matrix, give the distance between 2 classes

  • distance_transitions, stores the distance of all transitions mapped by the SOM

  • weights, Referent vectors (weights) associated to all classes

Variables

name (str) – The Name of the Map2d object. This name has no impact on the variable name, however it can be usefull when it comes to saving the Map2d object and its related figures, defaults to “MyMap”

Attributes¶

Map2d.classes

Vector of classes used by the Map2d

Map2d.distance_transitions

Vector of distance between consecutive BMU within the map

Map2d.m

The number of columns of the SOM

Map2d.n

The number of rows of the SOM

Map2d.nb_class

The total number of classes of the SOM (n*m)

Map2d.nb_classes_used

Number of different classes used by the Map2d

Map2d.nb_inputs_mapped

Number of inputs (classes or vectors) mapped by the Map2

Map2d.nb_missing_transitions

Number of transitions missed due to missing vectors

Map2d.nb_missing_values

Number of missing values in the data mapped

Map2d.nb_missing_vectors

Number of missing vectors in the data mapped

Map2d.occ_bmu_map

Occurence of each class as BMU within the map

Map2d.p

The size of input vectors (and of the weights too)

Map2d.relerr

Relative error between values and true_values of the Map2d

Map2d.shape

The shape of the SOM (n,m,p)

Map2d.som

SOM of the Map2d

Map2d.transition

Matrix of occurence of transitions

Map2d.true_values

Values of the real data represented by the Map2d

Map2d.values

Referent vectors associated to the classes used by the Map2d

Methods¶

Map2d.__init__

Class constructor

Map2d.add_true_values

Add true values to the Map2d

Map2d.map_from_classes

Construct the Map2d from a vector of classes

Map2d.map_from_data

Construct the Map2d from real data

Map2d.rmse_with_respect_to_depth

Computes the RMSE of the map for each variables at each depth levels.
